title: Ancient One - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Arrogant Characters   Artifact Crafting   Body Tempering   Confident Protagonist   Cultivation   Eidetic Memory   Hard-Working Protagonist   Lucky Protagonist   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Pill Concocting   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Shameless Protagonist   Soul Power   Special Abilities   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Long Water   Taiyi Shengshui   太一生水
description:
Previously one of the ten greatest Martial Emperor, Gu Feiyang somehow died near the mountains of Heaven Wave. 

Fifteen years later, Gu Feiyang crossed through the cycle of rebirth.  He was back! But this time, he was in the body of Li Yunxiao.  Since then, Li Yunxiao started a treacherous journey.  The world is in turmoil once more!>
